## ğŸ•¹ Controls

| Version      | Control     |
|--------------|-------------|
| Python (exe) | `SPACE` or `Click` â€“ Jump <br> `Close` â€“ Exit |
| JS (Web)     | `SPACE` or `Tap (Mobile)` â€“ Jump <br> `Close` - Exit|

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### ğŸ”¹ Clone the Repository:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/OmKadane/Flappy-Bird-in-2-languages.git
cd Flappy-Bird-in-2-languages

---

**ğŸ For Python Version:**

cd python-version
pip install -r requirements.txt
python main.py

---

**ğŸŒ For JavaScript Version:
Just open the index.html in any browser:**

cd js-version
start index.html

Or play it live: flappy-javascript.netlify.app
